name: Galaxy Fighter (Cetvrti Magi)
description:
Overview

Galaxy Fighter is space shooter game where you will fight various enemies and bosses trough 24 levels. Every enemy is different and many of them have some special abilities. When you defeat a boss you will unlock new ship. Second and third ship have special attack.

Controls

movement: w, a, s, d
shoot: u
special attack: i
pause game: escape
